I Specialize In

responsive web development and UI/UX design.

Conceptions

Creating a website that gets a lot of users’ attention is not just about learning various programming languages, you also need to learn some other concepts like DevTools, data formats, testing, APIs, authentication.

UI/UX Developer

applying interactive and visual design principles on websites and web applications for a positive and cohesive user experience.

Visual Design

strategically implementing images, colors, fonts, and other elements,” in order to enhance a design or interaction, and engage users.

Interaction

any kind of movement, communication, or interactivity between a user and a website.

My Creative Process

All of my UI/UX design projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the results that I am looking for.

1

Discuss the project

I like to discuss all the expectations and requirements of the project. I also like to know the scope of the project. This goes into the many concepts that I have learned.

2

Brainstorming Concept

This is a process of creating a wire frame of what the website or application could potentially look like.This is considered a rough draft and this is without images.

3

UI/UX Planning

Here begins that programming process. This is where the fonts, images, buttons, and colors are rendered.

4

Interaction

The interaction of the website or application is important because this is where I begin to look at at how the user will interact with the website or application. Including navigation the website or application.
